text: Lucien Clergue (; August 14, 1934 – November 15, 2014) was a French photographer. He was Chairman of the Academy of Fine Arts, Paris for 2013. Clergue was born in Arles, France. Clergue died in Nîmes, France from a long illness, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in France Category:French photographers Category:People from Arles
title: Lucien Clergue
